title: Salted Dark Chocolate Mousse
directions: Place avocados, coconut cream, maple syrup, and cocoa powder in a small food processor. Then, whirl until smooth. You my have to stop a few times to scrape the sides. Chill in refrigerator for about 30 minutes before serving. Top with whipped cream (below), shaved dairy free chocolate, and Himilayan sea salt.
Beat coconut cream and maple syrup with a hand mixer for about 5-10 minutes, or until stiff peaks form.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons coconut cream (the solid part in a can of chilled full-fat coconut milk)
2 tablespoons maple syrup (or honey - Add more if you want it sweeter!)
Dairy-free chocolate shavings or dairy free chocolate chips
1 can chilled full fat coconut milk (just the solid part of the can)
